job_description_summary.role: Full Stack Development Intern (IIoT & Data Analytics Platform)
key_responsibilities: Develop frontend (Angular) and backend (Node.js, Express) modules.
Work with time-series data using InfluxDB and Redis.
Build and integrate real-time APIs and data pipelines.
Participate in sprint planning, code reviews, and product discussions.
Write clean, modular, and well-documented code.
required_skills: At least one full stack project

github_profile_summary.bio: A backend developer primarily working with Typescript and Golang, currently learning Kubernetes.

key_projects.name: financepal
key_projects.description: A full-stack application with separate 'client' and 'server' directories, indicating experience in building complete applications.

key_projects.name: reserv
key_projects.description: A backend project using the NestJS (a Node.js framework) starter. The repository includes a 'docker-compose.yaml' file, demonstrating knowledge of containerization.

key_projects.name: node-rizz
key_projects.description: A low-code, AI-enhanced backend generation tool. The repository is structured with 'frontend' and 'backend' folders, showcasing another full-stack project.

evaluation_table.requirement: Develop backend modules using Node.js and Express.
evaluation_table.evidence: The profile's tech stack explicitly lists NodeJS and Express.js. The 'reserv' project is built with NestJS (a Node.js framework), and 'node-rizz' and 'financepal' are clearly Node.js backend projects.
evaluation_table.comments: Strong, direct evidence of proficiency in the required backend stack.

evaluation_table.requirement: Experience with at least one full stack project.
evaluation_table.evidence: The 'financepal' and 'node-rizz' repositories are structured with distinct client/server and frontend/backend folders, directly fulfilling this requirement.
evaluation_table.comments: Excellent evidence of multiple full-stack projects.

evaluation_table.requirement: Familiarity with NoSQL databases like MongoDB.
evaluation_table.evidence: MongoDB is explicitly listed as a skill in the main profile README's tech stack section.
evaluation_table.comments: Directly claims experience with the specified NoSQL database.

evaluation_table.requirement: Preferred experience with Git and Docker.
evaluation_table.evidence: The entire profile is on GitHub, demonstrating Git proficiency. Docker is listed in the tech stack, and the 'reserv' project includes a 'docker-compose.yaml' file.
evaluation_table.comments: Strong, practical evidence of experience with both required tools.

evaluation_table.evidence: The profile lists React and Next.js in the tech stack and the 'plannr' project uses React. There is no evidence of experience with Angular.
evaluation_table.comments: Candidate has frontend experience, but not with the required framework. This is a notable gap.

evaluation_table.requirement: Work with InfluxDB, Redis. Preferred exposure to IoT, MQTT.
evaluation_table.evidence: There is no mention of InfluxDB, Redis, MQTT, or any other time-series or IoT-specific technologies in the profile, tech stack, or project descriptions.
evaluation_table.comments: A major gap. No evidence of experience with the core data technologies for this specific IIoT role.

evaluation_table.evidence: Multiple backend projects ('http-server-go', 'reserv', 'financepal') imply extensive experience building APIs (likely REST). The tech stack includes Socket.io, indicating familiarity with real-time communication.
evaluation_table.comments: Strong evidence for general and real-time API development, but lacks specific evidence for data pipelines or IIoT protocols like MQTT.

overall_match_assessment.summary: The candidate is a strong backend developer with excellent alignment on Node.js, MongoDB, Git, and Docker. They have proven full-stack project experience. However, there are critical gaps in the required frontend framework (Angular) and the specialized time-series/IIoT technologies (InfluxDB, Redis, MQTT) that are central to the role's domain.
strengths: Proficient in the required backend stack: Node.js, TypeScript, and Express.js (via NestJS).
Strong skills in preferred tools like Docker and required tools like Git.
gaps: No evidence of experience with Angular; the profile shows proficiency in React instead.
Complete lack of demonstrated experience with time-series databases (InfluxDB) or in-memory stores (Redis).
No mention of IoT-specific protocols like MQTT.
recommendations_for_candidate: Create a small project using Angular to demonstrate adaptability and willingness to learn the required frontend framework.
To better align with the IIoT focus, build a proof-of-concept project that utilizes InfluxDB or Redis for data handling.
Update project READMEs to be more descriptive, explicitly stating the technologies used and the problems solved, especially concerning API design and data management.
